mapper.insert: insert into prBoard (useruid, title, writer, userId, introduce) values (#{useruid}, #{title}, #{writer}, #{userId}, #{introduce})
mapper.select:
SELECT prBoardNo, useruid, title, writer, userId, introduce, postDate FROM prBoard
AND title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
AND writer LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
AND userId LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
ORDER BY ${sortOption}
ORDER BY prBoardNo DESC
LIMIT #{startRowIndex}, #{rowCntPerPage}
SELECT prBoardNo, useruid, title, writer, userId, introduce, postDate FROM prBoard WHERE prBoardNo = #{prBoardNo}
SELECT prBoardNo, useruid, title, writer, userId, introduce, postDate FROM prBoard WHERE useruid = #{uid} ORDER BY postDate DESC LIMIT 5 OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM prBoard WHERE useruid = #{uid}
